body_html: @timmeinhardt Yes, you are right. Just a question that is it also better to wrap the Pipe with same configuration with Queue and SimpleQueue (e.g. with _reader, _writer of type ConnectionWrapper), since now the Pipe is raw python multiprocessing class.
body_text: @timmeinhardt Yes, you are right. Just a question that is it also better to wrap the Pipe with same configuration with Queue and SimpleQueue (e.g. with _reader, _writer of type ConnectionWrapper), since now the Pipe is raw python multiprocessing class.
body: @timmeinhardt Yes, you are right. Just a question that is it also better to wrap the Pipe with same configuration with Queue and SimpleQueue (e.g. with _reader, _writer of type ConnectionWrapper), since now the Pipe is raw python multiprocessing class.
